name: Goth Girl and the Ghastly Ghoul
name_original: Goth Girl and the Ghastly Ghoul
description:
Can you escape the dungeon before the Ghastly Ghoul catches you? Work your way through 4 unique puzzles. But be careful, if the Ghastly Ghoul possesses you, he'll undo all of your progress! Chase him down to regain control  of your body.

Made for GMTK Jam 2020

CONTROLS

===================================

WASD - Movement

L Shift - Zoom Out Camera

R - Reset Player

Created by Sandypoint Gamehouse

Sandypoint Gamehouse is a game studio by Jesse Morgan and Tristan Damron | Calif. USA

Music by Kevin MacLeod
